description: Explore how blockchain technology is transforming the music industry by creating new investment landscapes and innovative opportunities. Discover initiatives like Audius and Ujo Music that are using decentralized platforms to empower artists and standardize music rights management, paving the way for a new era of music innovation.
keywords: blockchain technology, music industry, innovation, Audius, Ujo Music, decentralized platforms, music rights management, Open Music Initiative, venture capital
title: Revolutionizing Music: The Role of Blockchain Funding
